amendment.description: To waive the passport fees for a relative of a deceased member of the Armed Forces proceeding abroad to visit the grave of such member or to attend a funeral or memorial service for such member.

vote.text: Amendment SA 277 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 277 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Biden. (consideration: CR S3175; text: CR S3175) To waive the passport fees for a relative of a deceased member of the Armed Forces proceeding abroad to visit the grave of such member or to attend a funeral or memorial service for such member.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 277 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Biden.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 277 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
